entry.title: [FR-1][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 15, 01:00 - 02:00 UTC

Nov 6, 21:25 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/11/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 23/10/2023 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Console User Interface will be unavailable during about 1 minute on ovhcloud-fr-1.webpaas.ovh.net.
Service improvement : Our partner will be doing a routine maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release an underlying software upgrade. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

entry.title: [Global][Manager] - Web Hosting/CDN/Databases statistics
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 9, 11:00 UTC  -  Dec 30, 14:07 UTC

Nov 7, 15:54 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/11/2023 11:00 UTC
End time : 30/12/2024 14:07 UTC
Service impact :
CDN statistics won't be available in the manager. You can access your data on the OVHcloud Web Statistics page to help you track and manage your website traffic.

Web Hosting and Databses statistics won't be available in the manager during the periods indicated below:
09/11/2023
13/11/2023
23/11/2023
30/11/2023
04/12/2023
05/12/2023
12/12/2023
14/12/2023
15/12/2023
18/12/2023
19/12/2023

Not impacted metrics for Databases are: "Shared", "Disk space consumption" and "Logs".
Not impacted metric for Web Hosting is: "Disk space consumed".

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a migration to our Manager Database which might have an impact on Web Hosting, CDN, Databses metrics in the manager.

entry.title: [EU][VoIP/Services] - Conferences
entry.content:
Nov 7, 21:13 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/11/2023 19:41 UTC
End time : 07/11/2023 20:26 UTC
Service status : Latency and errors were observed when creating a conference or when wanting to join a conference.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on the network
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
Related incident https://customer-service.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/jxw30sttghwk
